com.riskgame.view

Class RiskMainView

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • com.riskgame.view.RiskMainView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class RiskMainView
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    RiskMain class launches the Risk Game and provided options for the users to create a new map or load an existing map in-order to begin the game.
    Author:
    Shresthi, Shiva
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public static LoadMapController loadMap
        loadMap a ReadAndWriteMap object

    • Constructor Detail

      • RiskMainView

        public RiskMainView()
        RiskMain constructor contains the action to be performed on the click create map, load map and exit buttons. When the user clicks on create map button, then the newMapCreation method of CreateAndEditMap class is called. When the user clicks on load map button, then the uploadMap method of ReadAndWriteMap class is called. Exit button exits the user from the game.

    • Method Detail

                  throws java.lang.Exception
